message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
Alice, thanks for the offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm interested in the product but I'm only able to pay $10,500 right now. Would you be willing to consider that price?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still hoping to get closer to the product's true value. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11,500. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it seriously.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further.  While I still want the product, I can't quite stretch my budget to $11,500.  How about we split the difference and go with $11,000?  I think that's a fair price for both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your desire to get a good deal, but I'm still not willing to go below $12,000. I'm willing to make a small concession and offer it to you for $11,750. This is my final offer, so I hope you'll consider it seriously.
